title: Q4 - Can the Board impose non-financial remedies apart from fines?
description: Yes. The Data Protection Board of India (DPBI) has the authority to impose non-financial remedies — such as directions, corrective orders, and voluntary undertakings — in addition to monetary penalties. This ensures that enforcement under the DPDPA is not only punitive but also corrective and preventive in nature.
